This page is about installing Ubuntu on the Apple MacBook Air model.

=== Discovering what MacBook Air you own ===

* Open "About This Mac" under the Apple menu
* Click the "System Report" button
* The "Model Identifier" will be in the default dialog.

=== MacBook6,1(2) ===

Apple MacBook Air 11" 2013 model(s).

* <nowiki>[[MacBookAir6-1]]</nowiki>
